item.description:
The air is crisp and the leaves are starting to change. If you'd like to visit the club and check out what the White Mountains and North Conway has to offer in the fall, this is a great weekend. This meetup starts Friday, October 8th and ends Sunday, October 10th .
There are a lot of things going on in the valley this weekend: Attitash Oktoberfest, Maine's Fryeburg Fair, a Sat. canoe/ kayak on Conway Lake, some fun stuff for Sat afternoon/ evening, and a Sawyer Pond or Mount Kearsage hike on Sunday.

Full break down on cost will be sent to all “Yes” RSVPs.

Non-members: $15 per night lodging fee
Sat bratwurst dinner: $12

All members/ guests must be 21+

Hope to see you up!
item.name: Columbus Day Weekend 10/8-10/10
